text:
Georges Fontès (5 September 1924 – 3 March 2020) was a French politician. He was first a member of the Social Democratic Party (PSD), then the Rally for the Republic (RPR), and finally the Union for a Popular Movement (UMP). He was born in Béziers, France. He was Mayor of Béziers from 1983 to 1989 and General Councillor of Hérault from 1982 to 2015.
Fontès died on 3 March 2020 at the age of 96.
